Package com.jgefroh.core

The essential classes and interfaces of the Core framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IComponent The interface for all components.
IEntity Defines an interface for an entity, which is simply a collection of components.
IInfoPack Provides an interface to deal with sending data to a system
IInfoPackFactory Interface for the InfoPack factory.
ISystem The interface for Systems used by the Core.
 

Class Summary
Core The core class is the heart of the game.
Entity A default implementation of the IEntity interface.
LoggerFactory Provides an easy way to create an instance-specific logger.
System This is a default implementation of a system.
 

Package com.jgefroh.core Description

The essential classes and interfaces of the Core framework.

16MAY13
Version:
0.1.0
